issue.title: [Python] Let FileSystem.get_file_info accept a single path
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9875](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9875). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently you need to do `fs.get_file_info([path])[0]` to get the info of a single path. We can make the function also accept that directly (instead of a list): `fs.get_file_info(path)`.
